message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $20,000, which reflects its true worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
